info.title: WeTalk API
info.description: Social media API for posting, engagement, user connections, and content discovery.

schema.title: Response Login User Api V1 Auth Users Login Post

get.description: Get the personalized timeline (posts from users the current user follows).

schema.title: Response Get Timeline Api V1 Feed Timeline Get

get.description: Fetch a user's public profile by ID or username.
Get a list of users following the target user_id.
Get a list of users that the target user_id follows.

post.description: Block a user. Removes all follow relationships between the two users.

get.description: Get a list of pending follow requests for the current user.

post.description: Accept or Decline a follow request from a specific user.
Add a comment to a post. Supports one level of nesting (replies).

get.description: Get comments for a post. Returns top-level comments with a preview of up to 3 replies.

schema.title: Response Get Comments Endpoint Api V1 Posts  Post Id  Comments Get

delete.description: Delete a comment. Performs a soft delete if the comment has replies.
Remove a bookmark from a post. Idempotent.

get.description: Get the current user's bookmarked posts.

schema.title: Response Get User Bookmarks Endpoint Api V1 Posts Bookmarks Get

post.description: Share (Repost) a post. Creates a new post referencing the original.

Endpoint to upload an image file.
Uploads immediately and returns media details.

Endpoint to upload a video file.
Queues the video processing task and returns a confirmation message.

Endpoint to create a new post.
Validates media IDs and creates the post document.

schema.title: Response Get Posts Api V1 Posts  Get

get.description:
Get a specific user's posts (Profile Feed).
Includes is_liked and is_bookmarked state for the current viewer.

schema.title: Response Get User Posts Api V1 Posts User  User Id  Get
Response Search Api V1 Discovery Search Get

get.description: Get suggested users based on follower count.

schema.title: Response Get Suggestions Api V1 Discovery Suggestions Get
Response Get Trending Hashtags Api V1 Discovery Trending Get
Response Get Posts By Tag Api V1 Discovery Tags  Tag Name  Get

get.description: Explore Feed: Discover engaging content from users you don't follow.

schema.title: Response Get Explore Feed Api V1 Discovery Explore Get

post.description:
Upload a new story (Image/Video).
Requires a valid media_id from a previous upload.

get.description: Get the tray of active stories from followed users and yourself.

schema.title: Response Get Stories Feed Api V1 Stories Feed Get

post.description: Mark a story as 'seen'. Safe to call multiple times.

get.description: See who viewed your story. Only the owner can call this.

schema.title: Response Get Story Viewers Api V1 Stories  Story Id  Viewers Get

post.description: Send an emoji reaction to a story.

get.description: See reactions to your story. Only the owner can call this.

schema.title: Response Get Story Reactions Api V1 Stories  Story Id  Reactions Get

get.description: Get all conversations for the current user.

schema.title: Response Get Inbox Api V1 Conversations  Get

post.description:
Start a new chat (1-on-1 or Group).
If 1-on-1 exists, returns existing conversation.

get.description: Get message history for a conversation.

schema.title: Response Get Chat History Api V1 Conversations  Conversation Id  Messages Get

post.description: Send a message via REST (triggers WebSocket broadcast).

patch.description: Toggle pin status for a conversation.

CreatePostRequest.title: CreatePostRequest
CreatePostRequest.description:
Payload to create a new post.
Expects the ID returned from the upload endpoint.

MediaResponse.title: MediaResponse
MediaResponse.description:
Returned after a successful file upload.
Frontend uses 'media_id' to create the post.

PostResponse.title: PostResponse
PostResponse.description: Standard response when a post is created or retrieved.
